creditline: Gift of John Morton Morris in honor of Patrick Noon
description: angel with brown hair in ULQ, wearing olive green garment over a white undergarment with flowing red sash, holding a sword with a curving red blade in PR hand and reaching down with PL hand; slightly crouching man and woman in foreground wearing loincloths made of leaves; snake, LRC; some white quadrupeds in distance, LRQ; gilt frame with inner leaf pattern; "11" on plate at LRC
title: The Expulsion of Adam and Eve from Paradise
